description: This table contains compliance information about infusion pumps. The records included in this table are Alerts (ALT) records that track information about pump programming attempts.

columns.name: ALERT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the med alert record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: INF_ACTION_TAKEN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID of the action taken by the user after getting the message from the pump.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Apply HM Modifiers


Run Extension


Apply Care Plan Template


Task Template


Open SmartSet


Open Order Set


Send In Basket Message


Acknowledge/Override Warning


Discontinue Order


Cancel Warning


Remove Order


Barcode Scan


No Action Taken


Schedule Asynchronous


Single Order


Apply Contraindication


Cancel Fill


Place On-The-Fly Order


Open Pathway


Health Maintenance Override


Health Maintenance Postpone


Mark Result Critical


Cancel Dispense Preparation


Remove HM Modifiers


Patient FYI Flag


SmartData Element


Flag Result Message as Important


Accept BPA (No Action Taken)


Cancel BPA


Resend Message to Pump


Add Problem


Research Study


Questionnaire Series


Remove ERX single order


Remove EAP single order


Remove Study Medication Container


Link Study Medication Container


Activity Link


Inline Alert Warning


Care Path


Questionnaire


Use Partial Package


Add Diagnosis


Resolve Problem


Auto Launched Active Guidelines


Remove Order Set


Alert Becomes Not Applicable (Addressed Outside of Alert)


Replaced By New Version of Alert (Addressed Outside of Alert)


Alert Disappears (Addressed Outside of Alert)


Documentation Changed (Alert No Longer Applies)


Flowsheets


Outpatient Care Plan


Push Notification


Deferred


Deferred BPA No Longer Applies


Instant Order


Discontinue Active Order


Pregnancy Status


Best Care for My Patient

columns.name: INF_ERROR_TITLE
columns.description: The title of the message from the pump that is displayed to the user.

columns.name: INF_ERROR_TEXT
columns.description: The message text from the pump that is displayed to the user.

columns.name: INF_INT_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID of the status of the message from the pump. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Waiting


Complete

columns.name: INF_SEND_INST_DTTM
columns.description: The instant when the pump program was sent to the infusion pump.

columns.name: INF_RESPONSE_I_DTTM
columns.description: The instant when the response was received from the infusion pump.

columns.name: INF_MED_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the medication that is associated with this message from the pump.

columns.name: INF_ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the order that is associated with this message from the pump.

columns.name: INF_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user that is associated with this message from the pump. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: INF_DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient's department that is associated with this message from the pump.

columns.name: INF_DEVICE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the device that is associated with this message from the pump.

columns.name: INF_LINE_NUMBER
columns.description: The line number for the most recent prior message sent to the pump for the same order for the same patient encounter.

columns.name: VOLUME_TO_INFUSE_IN_ML
columns.description: The volume to infuse in mL that was sent to the pump.

columns.name: INF_ATTEMPT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Tracks the instant the user attempted to program the pump
